6c4cafff-eb4a-4e10-98a0-c0448c802c28.description: The badge indicates that this learner is part of the Oklahoma Canvas Area Network which is an affiliated group with the Oklahoma Council for Online Learning Excellence. The Council for Online Learning Excellence (COLE) is committed to empowering excellence in online and hybrid learning experiences through a framework that grows knowledge networks and advances collaborative initiatives that enhance student, faculty and institutional success in the state of Oklahoma.
6c4cafff-eb4a-4e10-98a0-c0448c802c28.name: OK-CAN Member

alignments.name: Active Membership
alignments.description: If you have questions regarding membership, please reach out to COLE.

f9c88db0-0e23-40a9-9571-3602de33a650.description: Effective communication is a powerful tool in the business environment. Students will learn how to articulate thoughts in a clear and concise manner that will allow ideas to be better understood by readers. They will also learn to spot, correct and avoid the most common writing pitfalls, and gain valuable experience analyzing, writing and revising a wide spectrum of business documents.
f9c88db0-0e23-40a9-9571-3602de33a650.name: Business Communication

6154c32f-1667-432f-87f8-198c1ee3b129.description: This badge will give you a glimpse into six different areas of American law: Tort Law, Contract Law, Property, Constitutional Law, Criminal Law, and Civil Procedure. You will gain insight into the complexities and dilemmas that arise from the application of law in different settings, and what is distinctive about American approaches.
6154c32f-1667-432f-87f8-198c1ee3b129.name: The Legal System

alignments.name: Successful completion

18e9edd4-514b-409f-b713-631f996c6b8f.description: If you were just admitted to college and are nervous about what the next step in life might look like, this badge is for you. At the conclusion of the course, learners will not only learn the basics of how colleges and universities operate and list some effective study strategies, but they will also develop key skills to be successful in the workplace. This badge also incorporates developmental course work.
18e9edd4-514b-409f-b713-631f996c6b8f.name: Workplace Fundamentals
